  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    AutoSalon(Customer customer)
    In the constructor, when the salon is initialized, we in advance read all the data, making objects from them and writing them to a separate array of all vehicles, because reading from file every time we need to sort smth is pretty inefficient Also, there we are calling a method to decrease current level, but it will only work if customer rented at least 1 vehicle

  • Constructor Details

    • AutoSalon

      public AutoSalon(Customer customer)
      In the constructor, when the salon is initialized, we in advance read all the data, making objects from them and writing them to a separate array of all vehicles, because reading from file every time we need to sort smth is pretty inefficient Also, there we are calling a method to decrease current level, but it will only work if customer rented at least 1 vehicle
      Parameters:
      customer - - current customer for rental purposes

  • Method Details

    • addVehicle

      public void addVehicle()

    • removeVehicle

      public void removeVehicle(String model)
      This method is used in Main class as an admin command It is consists of other private methods (like getting the vehicle -> ... ... -> removing from DB if exists -> updating list)
      Parameters:
      model - - string model parameter of the certain vehicle to find the object with the same input

      public Vehicle[] getVehiclesContainModel(String str, Vehicle[] selection)

      selection - - selection of objects we want to search from
